input.sentences: this is a big day at west point | and everyone is starting to file in .
there is so much history and tradition there .
the ceremonies carried on smoothly | and nicely .
the families were all thrilled to see their youngsters serve the nation .
and a well-deserving serviceman got his accolades .
output.sentences: It was graduation day a West Point!
Luke's family had long awaited this day, and listened eagerly to what the speaker had to say to the graduates.
How proud they were as Luke was awarded his diploma.
The photos were wonderful; so many people came to celebrate Luke.
My favorite is the one where Mom and Dad pinned on his medals which we will keep on the mantle of the fireplace.
